import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Helmet from 'react-helmet'; import { Row, Col } from 'antd'; import './css/form.css' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; import axios from 'axios' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Loading from '../utils/loading/Loading' const initialState = { title: '', body: '', description: '', slug: '', _id: '' } function CreatePost() { const token = useSelector(state => state.token) const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth) const {user, isAdmin} = auth const [myPost, setMyPost] = useState(initialState) const [slug, setSlug] = useState(''); const [slugButton, setSlugButton] = useState(false); const handleChangeInput = e =>{ const {name, value} = e.target setMyPost({...myPost, [name]:value}) const createSlug = e.target.value.trim().split(' ').join('-'); setSlug(createSlug); } const slugHandle = (e) => { setSlugButton(true); setSlug(e.target.value); }; return (
Create new post

); } export default CreatePost;
